thread.title: Trump, Carson seek Secret Service protection
thread.title_full: Trump, Carson seek Secret Service protection

title: Trump, Carson seek Secret Service protection
text:
Trump, Carson seek Secret Service pro... Trump, Carson seek Secret Service protection Next Story Prev Story 1 hr ago Read more: USA Today 
Fox News is reporting the Secret Service is taking steps to activate 24-hour protection for Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump and Ben Carson. An aide to Carson met with the agency's Dignitary Protection Division to request protection amid growing threats, the network reported, citing a source familiar with the conversation. Start the conversation, or Read more at USA Today.
